dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: The UCI Appliances Energy Consumption dataset includes measurements of temperature and humidity collected from a WSN, weather information from a nearby Weather Station, and recorded energy consumption from appliances and lighting fixtures in a low-energy house in Belgium over a period of 137 days.
dcterms:title: UCI Appliances Energy Consumption (AEC-DS)

dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: The UCI Household Power Consumption dataset contains electricity consumption data from a residential house in France, collected by continuous measurements over a four-year period with a resolution of one minute.
dcterms:title: UCI Household Power Consumption (HPC-DS)

dcterms:description: The Kaggle Smart Home with Weather Information dataset is a public dataset of IoE devices for smart buildings with weather capabilities, containing home appliance consumption and weather data from January 2016 to December 2016.
dcterms:title: Kaggle Smart Home with Weather Information Dataset (SHWI-DS)
